EmailTemplate.description: Asking the Sales Manager whether an unfunded Finance Deal can be built
EmailTemplate.name: Ready to build?
EmailTemplate.subject: Should this Customer's Boat be built?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi there,
The Finance customer, {!Account.Name} is currently Approved but Unfunded and the boat has been tagged and is currently Pending Rigging. Should the Shop staff go ahead building this unit?
Please send the Shop Foreman a Chatter on this customer's Opportunity ASAP letting them know whether to go ahead or not.
Thank you!
